title: MD
biography: K. V. Saravanan, better known as Saran, is an Indian film director and screenwriter who active mainly in Tamil cinema. He was once an assistant to K. Balachander. He owns production house called Gemini Productions.
aiSummary: R. K. Saran is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 77 at Cardiothoracic Surgery (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Annals of Surgery. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
